QuestData.Title: Warlord of Draenor
QuestData.Description: Durotan...$B$B<Raza'kul spits.>$B$BHe cowers behind the white flag of peace, relying upon diplomacy to win over our sworn enemies.$B$BEnemies that have taken our homes and driven us from our ancestral lands.$B$BThere is only one way to deal with the draenei and their newfound alliance of cowards - blood for blood.$B$BJoin me in crushing our enemies. Together we will flood this hallowed ground with the bones of the Alliance and earn tributes fit for a warchief!$B$BReturn here when your bloodthirst is sated.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Enemy Players in Player versus Player combat to earn 20 Broken Bones then place an offering at the Altar of Bones to Earn a Conqueror's Tribute.
